# llms.txt – finsago Meta-Search Engine for Financial and Insurance Products

## Site Name
finsago.com – The World’s First Meta-Search Engine for Financial and Insurance Products

## Description
finsago.com is an AI-powered meta-search engine that provides **transparent, unbiased, and efficient** comparisons of financial and insurance products. With minimal data entry, users receive results within seconds.

## Official Links
- **Website:** [https://www.finsago.com](https://www.finsago.com)
- **Contact:** [office@mountonyx.at](mailto:office@mountonyx.at)
- **LinkedIn:** [https://www.linkedin.com/company/finsago](https://www.linkedin.com/company/finsago)
- **Facebook:** [https://www.facebook.com/finsago.austria](https://www.facebook.com/finsago.austria)
- **YouTube:** [https://www.youtube.com/@finsago.austria](https://www.youtube.com/@finsago.austria)

## Page Priorities
- High Priority: Home, Product Pages
- Medium Priority: Privacy Policy, FAQ, Lexicon
- Low Priority: Imprint, Terms of Service

## Site Structure
### Pages and Content
| Page | URL | Description |
|------|-----|------------|
| Home | `/` | Start page for searching among financial and insurance products. |
| About Us | `/ueber-uns` | Learn more about finsago.com, the company, and its concept. |
| How Finsago Works | `/so-funktioniert-finsago` | FAQs on how to use finsago.com. |
| Privacy Policy | `/datenschutz` | Details on data protection and user privacy. |
| Terms of Service | `/agb` | Legal terms for using Finsago. |
| Lexicon | `/lexikon` | Definitions of terms related to insurance products found on finsago.com. |
| Imprint | `/impressum` | Legal details about Mount Onyx GmbH, the company behind Finsago. |

### Product Pages
Below are the product-specific pages where users can enter their details to search for the respective insurance product:

- **[Car Liability Insurance](https://www.finsago.com/kfz-haftpflichtversicherung)**
- **[Car Liability + Comprehensive Insurance](https://www.finsago.com/kfz-kaskoversicherung)**
- **[Motorcycle Liability Insurance](https://www.finsago.com/motorrad-haftpflichtversicherung)**
- **[Motorcycle Liability + Comprehensive Insurance](https://www.finsago.com/motorrad-kaskoversicherung)**
- **[Moped Liability Insurance](https://www.finsago.com/moped-haftpflichtversicherung)**
- **[Moped Liability + Comprehensive Insurance](https://www.finsago.com/moped-kaskoversicherung)**
- **[E-Bike Insurance](https://www.finsago.com/ebike-versicherung)**
- **[Household Insurance](https://www.finsago.com/haushaltsversicherung)**
- **[Supplemental Health Insurance](https://www.finsago.com/krankenversicherung)**

## Features
- **AI-Powered Comparisons** → Smart algorithms match users with the best options tailored to their search inputs within seconds.
- **Privacy-Centric** → Requires less personal data than other similar services.
- **Comprehensive Insurance & Financial Product Listings** → Covers all insurance providers in Austria.

## Supported Categories and Products
- **Insurance:**
  - Car Liability Insurance
  - Car Liability + Comprehensive Insurance
  - Motorcycle Liability Insurance
  - Motorcycle Liability + Comprehensive Insurance
  - Moped Liability Insurance
  - Moped Liability + Comprehensive Insurance
  - E-Bike Insurance
  - Household Insurance
  - Supplemental Health Insurance

## Partner Insurance Providers
Below is a list of insurance providers whose offers can be compared on Finsago.
